tool_description: Designed for developers to be used for blockchain development
name: boilerplate-wiki-api
title: boilerplate-wiki-api

api_list.name: Get All Instructions format on Altcoin
api_list.description: This will return all  Instructions links on how to develop  a program for all available link on API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://boilerplate-wiki-api.p.rapidapi.com/instructions/Format"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boilerplate-wiki-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://boilerplate-wiki-api.p.rapidapi.com/instructions/{blockchainid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boilerplate-wiki-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
